content: Does HAPI support code:in searches, e.g. of a ValueSet? For example, assuming a ValueSet with the url="http://example.com/MyValueSet" was uploaded to HAPI and I did a search for: .<HAPI-base-url>/Condition?patient=<patId>&code:in=http://example.com/MyValueSet it would return any Condition resources for this patient that had a code in that ValueSet.
